media:group.media:title: Scifi Hifi
media:group.media:description:
About the Dual MN 8010, the remarkable retro stereo set you've never heard of, that has a removable GUI (Graphical User Interface).

Music: https://posy.bandcamp.com/
Or Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/3zkrmBzisZKngkrd6gXLHg
Or Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/artist/posy/1522538629

4 notes: 
1. The clock reset is actually by design and described in the manual.
2. I mixed up Left and Right and one point (one of my specialties)
3. The tone function actually bypasses bass/treble settings
4. It sounds quite good, especially the amplifier seems quite crisp, with better speakers it can sound even better.

Much more info about the history of Dual: http://dual-reference.info/History/DUALHIST.htm
